p: The investigation of nanosized complexes prepared using high amylose corn starch and flax seed oil processed to powder of MPs by spray-drying and subsequently incorporated into bread formulation showed a considerable reduction of lipid oxidation in breads during baking due to the encapsulation as well as a decreased formation of carcinogen acrylamide, suggesting a beneficial effect of this nanoformulation on the final product quality and safety [ 189].
